price: (54) And they [i.e., the disbelievers] planned, but Allāh planned. And Allāh is the best of planners.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
